name: Spark Drive Demo
description:
In the near distant future, a virus is attacking PCs all around the world. We need to use our Spark Drives to attack back at the virus. Play as the cute Neko Chan, collect new Spark Drives and use them to fight off the invading viruses.

*Project was made as part of our final submission for RMIT's GDS6 class.

*Game is still rushed in a few places but still good enough considering the time we had :))
